Entries.Abigail: I didn't tell you, but I've been practicing for this year's egg hunt. I'm gonna fry the competition!$h
Entries.Haley: I bought a brand new spring dress for the festival. What do you think of it?$h
Entries.Leah: I could go for a mushroom and gruyere omelet right about now...
Entries.Penny: If you're not going to let the children win this year, can you at least try to beat Abigail?$u
Entries.Sebastian: I'm just gonna hang back for this one. I need a smoke.
Entries.Shane: No chickens were harmed in the making of this Egg Festival.

Entries.Abigail: I guess we're doing this again, huh?#$e#Kindly ignore the stain on my dress. It's blackberry cobbler.
Entries.Haley: I love dressing up fancy for the Flower Dance. We should have more festivals like this.$h
Entries.Leah: Can you imagine if I went hiking in my Flower Dance dress?$h
Entries.Penny: I'm feeling better about the Flower Dance this year. But my heart is still racing.$s
Entries.Sebastian: How did this ever become a ritual in Pelican Town? What a weird group of people.$u
Entries.Shane: I don't know why anyone would want to dance with me. I've got two left feet.

Entries.Abigail: I've got sand in my shoes and it's way too hot today for this. I think I need to put on more sunblock...
Entries.Haley: I hope the soup was made with coconut milk this year. Coconut is totally my favorite flavor.$h
Entries.Leah: That soup needs a little bit more acidity... I'll run home and get a bottle of wine!$h
Entries.Penny: The Governor kind of weirds me out. I don't know what to make of him.$s
Entries.Sebastian: The soup smells good, but there's too many people hanging around the pot. I'll try later.
Entries.Shane: Wouldn't it be cool if they made a soup that tasted like pizza?$h

Entries.Abigail: It's the perfect night to watch the Moonlight Jellies. I kinda wish I could be one of them.
Entries.Haley: Do you think I have time to run home and get my camera before the Moonlight Jellies come out?$u
Entries.Leah: If we don't care for our oceans, the Jellies could very well go extinct. I would hate for that to happen.$s
Entries.Penny: They're so delicate and so pretty... I wonder if they ever feel forgotten about.$s
Entries.Sebastian: If I jumped into the ocean tonight, do you think the Moonlight Jellies would take me with them?
Entries.Shane: Last night I had a dream that I came to see the Moonlight Jellies, but the Jellies were all chickens. What in the heck does that mean?$u

Entries.Abigail: Next year I think they should set up some arcade games that spit out Star Tokens when you win.#$b#I'm gonna talk to Mayor Lewis about it.
Entries.Haley: Do you want me to take pictures of your grange display this year? That way, you don't repeat yourself next year.$h
Entries.Leah: This really is the perfect place for me to sell my art. Maybe I'll do that next year.$u
Entries.Penny: The smell from Willy's grange display is wafting over here... ugh...$s
Entries.Sebastian: I asked the Fortune Teller if I was ever going to move to the city. She told me... 'Go away.'#$e#I don't know what to make of that.$s
Entries.Shane: Got any eggs in your grange display this year? Maybe I'll stop by and take a look.

Entries.Abigail: I already saw the spiders and I'm heading back. Those things are freaky!$s
Entries.Haley: Are you really going into the maze? Let me know how scary it is when you come back out.$s
Entries.Leah: Have you ever heard of pumpkin wine? Is that a thing?
Entries.Penny: Don't tell anyone, but I just accidentally dropped my book into the cauldron. Oops!$h
Entries.Sebastian: Some years, I feel like I can see the strings moving these skeletons. But I can't see anything this year. What is this black magic?
Entries.Shane: This stuff doesn't scare me. There are lot scarier things in life than big fake spiders.

Entries.Abigail: I think this is my finest work yet, don't you agree?$h#$b#Much better than Leah's sculpture that looks like... well, you know what it looks like.#$e#Maybe I can donate this snowgoon to the museum. Where's Gunther?$h
Entries.Haley: I'm absolutely frigid out here. Let's get this show on the road, people!$u
Entries.Leah: This sculpture is beautiful, don't you think? It's giving me an idea...
Entries.Penny: Oh no, I'm not taking requests this year. Last year you got me into a bit of trouble with the children. Go do your fishing.$u
Entries.Sebastian: The Mayor asked me if I wanted to enter the fishing contest one year. I just rolled my eyes. He never asked again.
Entries.Shane: They make us stand out in the cold so long for this? I'm going to the saloon.

Entries.Abigail: While my Dad's mulling over how much he spent on food for the festival, my Mom's mulling wine. How did I get in this family?
Entries.Haley: I miss my parents. They love the Feast of the Winter Star. I wish they were here.$u
Entries.Leah: We're all so fortunate for this great feast in front of us. Where do I even begin?$h
Entries.Penny: I'm very grateful for a lot of things this year. And I'm also very hungry.$h
Entries.Sebastian: Demetrius is driving me crazy today. He can be so controlling. What's his deal?
Entries.Shane: Don't you think it's weird we have this big feast outside in the cold? The food would stay hotter if we ate inside.
